plot: Man hires foreign firm to take care of the bureaucratic details of his suicide. The hardest part, however, he must do it on his own. Alone in the European winter, the man has three days to take courage.
title: Frio
plot_es: Man hires foreign firm to take care of the bureaucratic details of his suicide. The hardest part, however, he must do it on his own. Alone in the European winter, the man has three days to take courage.
plot_en: Man hires foreign firm to take care of the bureaucratic details of his suicide. The hardest part, however, he must do it on his own. Alone in the European winter, the man has three days to take courage.
